question: India's first dedicated 'Khadi Mall' will soon be set up by which state government?
explanation: India\'s first dedicated \'Khadi Mall\' will soon be set up by the Jharkhand government to boost market for khadi and khadi made products. The land in the Heavy Engineering Corporation (HEC) campus will be made available to the Khadi Board to develop the country\'s first Khadi mall. The artisans would be provided technological aid for value addition in their products, while rural, urban and tourism \'haats\' will provide them markets for their goods.
